name: Jail Simulator
description:
Jail Simulator is the ultimate experience of being in jail, featuring good graphics, immersive first person animations, dialogues, fights and more!
Customize your character: select your appearance and crime to start, people will treat you differently based on how strong you are, what your crime is, and other factors.
Join gangs, or become a snitch. Go to gym, get rigged and go to showers like a boss.

Features

-Be in a prison cell
-Time of day: wake up, go to dining room, go for a walk, use showers, sleep, repeat
-Pick fights with other inmates for reputation
-Go to gym to get stronger & dominate everyone
-Go to showers
-Talk to prisoners
-Full life simulation: eat, drink, sleep, use toilet, brush your teeth, etc
-First person view
